mini_bots.description: Loyal mechanical companions that provide quality of life enhancements and unlock the Pet Sanctuary zone
mini_bots.note: All mini bots unlock access to Pet Sanctuary. Each bot has unique utility effects.

tier_1.name: Scrapper
tier_1.description: A rusty little helper made from spare parts
tier_1.effect: Automatically picks up crafting materials within 5 meters

tier_1.name: Sparky
tier_1.effect: Leaves a trail of blue sparks behind you (cosmetic)

tier_1.name: Clunker
tier_1.description: Makes adorable mechanical noises as it waddles
tier_1.effect: Plays random beeps and boops periodically

tier_1.name: Rusty
tier_1.description: Old but loyal, leaves oil drips everywhere
tier_1.effect: Leaves small oil puddle trail (cosmetic, disappears after 3 seconds)

tier_2.name: Zippy
tier_2.description: Fast-moving bot that zips around excitedly
tier_2.effect: Automatically picks up gold within 8 meters

tier_2.name: Glowbug
tier_2.effect: Provides ambient lighting around player (cosmetic, reveals dark areas)

tier_2.name: Chatter
tier_2.description: Repeats random voice lines in garbled robot speech
tier_2.effect: Occasionally says silly phrases in robotic voice

tier_2.name: Disco Ball
tier_2.description: A spherical bot covered in reflective panels
tier_2.effect: Spins and reflects rainbow lights around you (cosmetic)

tier_2.name: Porter
tier_2.description: Follows dutifully with a small cargo container

tier_3.name: Vac-Bot
tier_3.description: Advanced collection bot with extended range
tier_3.effect: Automatically picks up all items (except equipment) within 12 meters

tier_3.name: Phoenix Drone
tier_3.description: Leaves a trail of flickering flames
tier_3.effect: Creates a fire trail behind you (cosmetic, harmless flames)

tier_3.name: Holo-Buddy
tier_3.effect: Randomly displays holographic emotes above your head

tier_3.name: Scout-Bot
tier_3.effect: Reveals nearby treasure chests on minimap

tier_3.name: Recycler
tier_3.description: Processes junk items into useful materials
tier_3.effect: Converts gray items into scrap materials automatically

tier_3.name: Jukebox
tier_3.effect: Plays random chiptune music tracks while exploring

tier_4.name: Omni-Vac
tier_4.effect: Automatically picks up ALL items within 15 meters and sorts them in inventory

tier_4.name: Prism
tier_4.effect: Leaves a shimmering rainbow trail that cycles through all colors

tier_4.name: DJ-Bot
tier_4.effect: Plays boss music during combat, chill beats during exploration

tier_4.name: Echo
tier_4.description: Mimics your movements with a slight delay
tier_4.effect: Creates a holographic clone that mirrors your actions (cosmetic)

tier_4.name: Lucky
tier_4.description: Covered in lucky charms and trinkets
tier_4.effect: Slightly increases chance of rare drops (does not stack with other luck bonuses)

tier_4.name: Fashion-Bot
tier_4.effect: Allows you to save and swap between 3 cosmetic loadouts instantly

tier_4.name: Party Starter
tier_4.effect: Creates fireworks, confetti, and party effects on kills

augment_chips.name: Augment Chip
augment_chips.description: Neural enhancement chips that provide powerful bonuses and unique abilities

special_effects.name: Cross-Link Chip
special_effects.description: Grants access to another class's skill
special_effects.effect: Unlocks 1 skill from another class (tier determines skill level cap)

special_effects.name: Efficiency Chip
special_effects.description: Chance to cast skills for free
special_effects.effect: 10% chance skills cost no resources (T1), up to 25% (T4)

special_effects.name: Echo Chamber Chip
special_effects.effect: 5% chance to duplicate skill cast (T1), up to 15% (T4)

special_effects.name: Morph Matrix Chip
special_effects.description: Transform into specific elite enemy type
special_effects.effect: Grants transformation into Boss/Elite form with unique abilities

special_effects.name: Overclock Chip
special_effects.description: Drastically reduces cooldown of one specific ability
special_effects.effect: One chosen ability has 50% reduced cooldown

wings.name: Wings
wings.description: Cosmetic flight systems that display your style

neural_implant.name: Neural Implant
neural_implant.description: Direct brain-computer interface for enhanced processing
